titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Ford Foundation Fund files
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Ford Foundation Fund files FA715

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-01-30 00:02:07 -0500.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Ford Foundation Fund files

physdesc.extent: 9 letter document boxes, 1 half-letter document boxes.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Processing conducted by Ford Foundation, Belinda Boon, 1987 July-September.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The Ford Foundation Fund files consist of correspondence, summaries of grant actions, charts, listing grant totals, excerpts from dockets and minutes of Trustees meetings, reports, budgets and recommendations, all of which reflect the Foundation's grant-related activities from 1949-1973, with the bulk of the records documenting 1950-1960.
The files provide important background material on the operations of the Foundation from its earliest grant making days through the early 1970s.

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: Original order of the records has been maintained.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use note
userestrict.p: Completion of a use agreement is required prior to providing scholarly access. See RAC Head of Reference (or applicable designee) for details.
Ford Foundation holds title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection for scholarly purposes. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Ford Foundation.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Ford Foundation archive was deposited at RAC in 2011. Ford Foundation records, correspondence, reports, program files and officers papers were transferred to, and accessioned by, RAC beginning in 2011. Accessions continue as necessary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.
